fetter.title: Frostwind Swordsman
fetter.detail: An accomplished swordsman and a strategic thinker in the Knights of Favonius, rumored to hail from beyond Mondstadt.

costume.name: Icy Featherflight
costume.description: Kaeya's outfit. Fashionable clothes festooned with a fur collar.

costume.name: Sailwind Shadow
costume.description: Kaeya's outfit from his role as the "Dagger Bandit" in the play. Though flamboyant and designed to be as eye-catching as possible, it isn't difficult to put on, though it does take some time to get all the accessories and daggers sorted.

nameCard.name: Kaeya: Pavo Ocellus
nameCard.description: Namecard style.\nThe pattern of peacock feathers resembles eyes that never shut. Can we really say that this Pavo Ocellus is missing an eye...?

0.name: Normal Attack: Ceremonial Bladework
0.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Performs up to 5 rapid strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

1.name: Frostgnaw
1.description: Unleashes a frigid blast, dealing Cryo DMG to opponents in front of Kaeya.\n\nKaeya seems affable, but his nature is that of unyielding ice.

3.name: Glacial Waltz
3.description: Coalescing the frost in the air, Kaeya summons 3 icicles that revolve around him. These icicles will follow the character around and deal Cryo DMG to opponents in their path for the ability's duration. A winsome smile, genial words, and the merciless hoarfrost that lies beneath... These are all Kaeya's weapons.

4.name: Cold-Blooded Strike
4.description: Every hit with <color=#FFD780FF>Frostgnaw</color> regenerates HP for Kaeya equal to 15% of his ATK.

5.name: Glacial Heart
5.description: Opponents <color=#99FFFFFF>Frozen</color> by <color=#FFD780FF>Frostgnaw</color> will drop additional Elemental Particles.\nFrostgnaw may only produce a maximum of 2 additional Elemental Particles per use.

6.name: Hidden Strength
6.description: Decreases sprinting Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.\nNot stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

0.name: Excellent Blood
0.description: The CRIT Rate of Kaeya's Normal and Charge Attacks against opponents affected by <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo</color> is increased by 15%.

1.name: Never-Ending Performance
1.description: While <color=#FFD780FF>Glacial Waltz</color> is in effect, for each opponent defeated, its duration is increased by 2.5s, up to a maximum of 15s.

2.name: Dance of Frost
2.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Frostgnaw</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

3.name: Frozen Kiss
3.description:
Triggers automatically when Kaeya's HP falls below 20%:
Creates a shield that absorbs damage equal to 30% of Kaeya's Max HP. Lasts for 20s.
This shield absorbs <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color> with 250% efficiency.
Can only occur once every 60s.

4.name: Frostbiting Embrace
4.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Glacial Waltz</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

5.name: Glacial Whirlwind
5.description: <color=#FFD780FF>Glacial Waltz</color> will generate 1 additional icicle, and will regenerate 15 Energy when cast.
